description: Zundamaru is back... For now! Even without missions, we elite ninjas face grave dangers every day!

REGULAR.description: Tis the season for craving sweet and brown stuff! No sense waiting around for something I want, making the first move is the ninja way!

titles.title: Flowering Valentine, You`ve Pierced My Heart
Hana no Valentine wa Heart ni Zukkyun
花のバレンタインはハートにずっきゅん

REGULAR.description: This time, I just can`t take my eyes off of that certain area of that one dude... Check it out? Are you kidding me, of course I will! Now, I wonder if it comes off...?

titles.title: Flowering Distracted All of a Sudden by That Thing I Always See, Happens Doesn`t It?
Hana no Itsumo Miteru Mon ga Ki ni Naru Koto Aru yo na
花のいつも見てるもんが気になることあるよな

REGULAR.description: Being an elite ninja means training every day. This time I`ll be showcasing my prowess with shuriken! After all, I am the #1 shuriken thrower of all second-rate Iga ninjas! Alright, so what am I gonna hit today?

titles.title: 花の週末は手裏剣ちゃん
花のずんだ丸 じゃんく
